data.actual_result: The bottom of both are compared is too different
data.short_description: The bottom of the ban settings is too long compared with other
data.steps_to_repro: - Now , you should have 2 server for it. The 1. should be your ownership and in the 2. Not yours but you need admin roles to see server settings - Go to 1. Server (which you have ownership) , go to server settings scroll the bottom and see the blanket is too short below of bans setting - Now go to the 2. Server which you have admin perms but not owned. Scroll to the bottom and observe below of thr bans settings - Compare it, the 2. Server will have very long bottom - That is caused by the ' Security ' settings in the up. If theres a security settings the bottom would be short
